BF_001_FormationExp.speaker: UI
BF_001_FormationExp.text:
Prevents enemies from focusing on a single ally.
Action order increases after defending.
BP increases by 1 each turn.

BF_002_FormationExp.speaker: UI
BF_002_FormationExp.text:
A combo-oriented formation.
BP cost -1 after a combo.
BP increases by 1 each turn.

BF_003_FormationExp.speaker: UI
BF_003_FormationExp.text:
A combo-oriented formation.
BP cost -3 after defeating a foe.
BP increases by 1 after combos.

BF_004_FormationExp.speaker: UI
BF_004_FormationExp.text:
Avoid those combos! Increases all allies' attack.
BP cost -3 after defeating a foe.
BP increases by 3 each turn. Resets after combos.

BF_005_FormationExp.speaker: UI
BF_005_FormationExp.text:
A defensive formation. BP cost -1 after defending.
Sacrifices all allies' attack for defense.
BP increases by 1 each turn.

BF_006_FormationExp.speaker: UI
BF_006_FormationExp.text:
Excels at both offense and defense.
1st position targeted more; 5th targeted less.
BP increases by 1 each turn.

BF_007_FormationExp.speaker: UI
BF_007_FormationExp.text:
Ally in 1st position acts as a decoy.
1st position defense up; 2ndâ€“5th down.
BP increases by 1 each turn.

BF_008_FormationExp.speaker: UI
BF_008_FormationExp.text:
Acts swiftly in ascending position order.
Tech BP cost -1 in the 1st position.
BP increases by 1 each turn. Resistant to paralysis.

BF_009_FormationExp.speaker: UI
BF_009_FormationExp.text:
A formation where allies act slowly but in sequence.
Action order increases upon defending.
BP increases by 1 each turn.

BF_010_FormationExp.speaker: UI
BF_010_FormationExp.text:
Tech BP cost -1 in 1st position.
Resistant to darkness.
BP increases by 1 each turn.

BF_011_FormationExp.speaker: UI
BF_011_FormationExp.text:
Tech BP cost -1 in 1st position.
Resistant to stun.
BP increases by 1 each turn.

BF_012_FormationExp.speaker: UI
BF_012_FormationExp.text:
Tech BP cost -1 in 5th position.
Resistant to poison.
BP increases by 1 each turn.

BF_013_FormationExp.speaker: UI
BF_013_FormationExp.text:
Tech BP cost -1 in 5th position.
Resistant to stench.
BP increases by 1 each turn.

BF_014_FormationExp.speaker: UI
BF_014_FormationExp.text:
Used by squires to protect spellcasters.
1st position conditional BP -1. 2nd position spell BP -1
and increased attack. BP increases by 1 each turn.

BF_015_FormationExp.speaker: UI
BF_015_FormationExp.text:
Facilitates the casting of powerful spells.
Spell BP cost -2, increased attack, and increased defense
in 5th position. BP increases by 1 each turn.

BF_016_FormationExp.speaker: UI
BF_016_FormationExp.text:
Effective against flying foes.
Gathers allies to either end of the timeline.
BP increases by 1 after combos.

BF_017_FormationExp.speaker: UI
BF_017_FormationExp.text:
Yield initiative in favor of conditionals and combos.
Sacrifices all allies' attack for defense.
BP increases by 1 after combos.

BF_018_FormationExp.speaker: UI
BF_018_FormationExp.text:
Allows for easy 2x combos.
BP cost -1 after performing combos.
BP increases by 1 after combos.

BF_019_FormationExp.speaker: UI
BF_019_FormationExp.text:
1st position acts swiftly.
Resistant to petrification.
BP increases by 1 each turn.

BF_020_FormationExp.speaker: UI
BF_020_FormationExp.text:
Firms up defenses at the end of the line.
Increased defense in the 5th position.
BP increases by 1 each turn.

BF_021_FormationExp.speaker: UI
BF_021_FormationExp.text:
Ally in 3rd position draws enemy attacks.
Attack down and defense up in 3rd position.
BP increases by 1 each turn.

BF_022_FormationExp.speaker: UI
BF_022_FormationExp.text:
Facilitates spellcasting and effective against airborne foes.
Spell BP cost -1, increased attack, and increased defense
in 4th and 5th positions. BP increases by 1 each turn.

BF_023_FormationExp.speaker: UI
BF_023_FormationExp.text:
Puts 1st position in the spotlight.
BP increases by 1 each turn.

BF_024_FormationExp.speaker: UI
BF_024_FormationExp.text:
2nd, 3rd, and 4th positions have increased attack. All allies have decreased defense.
BP increases by 1 after defeating foes by means other than poison or enemy actions.

BF_025_FormationExp.speaker: UI
BF_025_FormationExp.text:
Overwhelming spiritual power grants high starting BP,
but decreases all allies' attack and defense.
BP does not change.

BF_026_FormationExp.speaker: UI
BF_026_FormationExp.text:
1st and 2nd positions focus on finishing off foes.
BP cost -1 in 3rd position.
BP increases by 2 after defeating foes by means other than poison or enemy actions.

BF_027_FormationExp.speaker: UI
BF_027_FormationExp.text:
Facilitates the use of counterattacks and interrupts.
1st and 2nd positions are more easily targeted.
BP increases by 1 after using counterattacks or interrupts.

BF_028_FormationExp.speaker: UI
BF_028_FormationExp.text:
Allies act slowly and sacrifice attack for defense.
BP cost -1 in the 1st and 2nd positions.
BP increases by 1 each turn.

BF_029_FormationExp.speaker: UI
BF_029_FormationExp.text:
Easy to disrupt enemy combos in 1st and 2nd positions.
Resistant to confusion.
BP increases by 1 each turn.

BF_099_FormationExp.speaker: UI
BF_099_FormationExp.text:
This formation cannot be changed.
BP increases by 1 each turn.

BF_TUTORIAL_FormationExp.text:
This formation cannot be changed.
BP increases by 1 each turn.

BF_TUTORIAL_BF_FormationExp.text:
